column2: "Great work, <%me>! I know we're out there all the time, but we've gotta stay strong."
"Welcome back, Master! You're working quite hard again... Just what one would expect from a Guardian!"
"I am glad to see you safe as well, Azanami... Is there anything wrong?"
"Hey Lucotte. Is it alright if I ask you something?"
"Of course!"
"You got something bothering you? Why not try getting it off your chest?"
"Huh? Wh-, Why... What makes you think..."
"You have trouble relying on others, yeah? You feel like you have to put on a cool front, and be the one people go to for help."
"G-Goodness... What gave you that impression...?"
"Why do you think? I'm actually the same way. So I can tell just by looking at you."
"You're convinced you're the one who gives out advice, not asks for it... Yeah?"
"Azanami..."
"Ah! No no, I'm not trying to call you out or anything! It's very noble to be someone people can rely on!"
"But you see... Everyone has each other's back here."
"Even you need people you can rely on, who will help you out."
"So there's absolutely nothing wrong with asking us for help with anything... Isn't that right, Guardian?"
"...Thank you very much. Your words have touched my heart... Very well, I shall impose on you just a bit."
"The truth is, I am not very confident that I can live up to everyone's expectations as the representative of a new class."
"Hmhm. Leading a new class is a big responsibility. I had it pretty rough too."
"Everyone expects you to be really strong, and to know exactly how to do everything."
"And that just makes things  harder. You can't ask anyone for help... Not even the other class reps."
"You have to put on a confident front while hiding your insecurities."
"But take it from me, it's totally natural to start without any confidence. You gain it as you gain experience."
"So you're doing fine, Lucotte! You have my personal guarantee... Be confident in your lack of confidence!"
"...Wait, was that a weird thing to say?"
"...Hehe. Not at all, it was wonderful."
"Ahahaa. I guess I didn't put it perfectly, but if it helped you relax at all, I'm glad I could do my part."
"Thank you... I am truly grateful to both of you. And, well..."
"If you have no objections, would it be alright to impose on you again...?"
"Ask us anytime!"
"Azanami will listen!"
"Master, Azanami... Thank you both very much."
"That's right! Just leave everything to me! ...Wait, what about you!"
"Hehe...! Thank you both very much."
"My experience still pales in comparison to yours. I will accept your offer, and rely on you two on occasion."
"I trust you will be of great help. Thank you for your kindness!"
